value.string:
from Products.ERP5Type.Message import Message
 from DateTime import DateTime
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 N_ = lambda msg, **kw: Message('erp5_ui', msg, **kw)
 getObject = portal.portal_catalog.getObject
 isSource = portal.AccountingTransaction_isSourceView
 precision = portal.ERP5Accounting_getParams().get('precision', 2)
 
 # update selection
 selection_name="accounting_upcoming_annotation_selection"
 portal.portal_selections.updateSelectionCheckedUidList(selection_name,
 listbox_uid, uids)
 portal.portal_selections.setSelectionParamsFor(selection_name,
 params=dict(source=source, destination=destination,))
 
 if not uids:
 return context.ERP5Site_redirect(
 '%s/AccountingTransactionModule_viewUpcomingAnnotationDialog' %
 portal.absolute_url(), keep_items=dict(
 precision=precision, amount=amount, side=side, at_date=at_date,
 from_date=from_date, cancel_url=cancel_url,
 portal_status_message=N_('Please select transactions')))
 
 
 current_amount = 0
 for uid in uids:
 obj = getObject(uid)
 if side == 'debit':
 if obj.AccountingTransaction_isSourceView():
 current_amount += obj.getSourceInventoriatedTotalAssetDebit() or 0
 else:
 current_amount += obj.getDestinationInventoriatedTotalAssetDebit() or 0
 else:
 if obj.AccountingTransaction_isSourceView():
 current_amount += obj.getSourceInventoriatedTotalAssetCredit() or 0
 else:
 current_amount += obj.getDestinationInventoriatedTotalAssetCredit() or 0
 
 if round(amount, precision) != round(current_amount, precision):
 return context.ERP5Site_redirect(
 '%s/AccountingTransactionModule_viewUpcomingAnnotationDialog' %
 portal.absolute_url(), keep_items=dict(
 amount=amount, side=side, precision=precision,
 from_date=from_date, at_date=at_date, cancel_url=cancel_url,
 portal_status_message=N_(
 'Incorrect Amount. Current Amount is ${current_amount}',
 mapping=dict(current_amount=current_amount))))
 
 # OK, remove all previously selected uids for next time
 portal.portal_selections.setSelectionToIds(selection_name, [])
 portal.portal_selections.setSelectionInvertModeFor(selection_name, False)
 
 # and create the transaction
 tr = portal.accounting_module.newContent(
 source_section=portal.portal_preferences\
 .getPreferredAccountingTransactionSourceSection(),
 resource=portal.portal_preferences\
 .getPreferredAccountingTransactionCurrency(),
 created_by_builder=1,
 start_date=DateTime(),
 portal_type='Accounting Transaction',
 )
 
 if side == 'debit':
 tr.newContent(
 portal_type='Accounting Transaction Line',
 source=destination,
 source_debit=current_amount)
 causality_value_list = []
 for uid in uids:
 obj = getObject(uid)
 causality_value_list.append(obj.getParentValue())
 if side == 'debit':
 if obj.AccountingTransaction_isSourceView():
 quantity = obj.getSourceInventoriatedTotalAssetDebit() or 0
 mirror_section = obj.getDestinationSection()
 else:
 quantity = obj.getDestinationInventoriatedTotalAssetDebit() or 0
 mirror_section = obj.getSourceSection()
 line = tr.newContent(
 portal_type='Accounting Transaction Line',
 destination_section=mirror_section,
 source=source,
 source_credit=quantity)
 else:
 if obj.AccountingTransaction_isSourceView():
 quantity = obj.getSourceInventoriatedTotalAssetCredit() or 0
 mirror_section = obj.getDestinationSection()
 else:
 quantity = obj.getDestinationInventoriatedTotalAssetCredit() or 0
 mirror_section = obj.getSourceSection()
 line = tr.newContent(
 portal_type='Accounting Transaction Line',
 destination_section=mirror_section,
 source=source,
 source_debit=quantity)
 
 if side == 'credit':
 tr.newContent(
 portal_type='Accounting Transaction Line',
 source=destination,
 source_credit=current_amount)
 
 tr.setCausalityValueList(causality_value_list)
 
 portal.ERP5Site_redirect('%s/view' % tr.absolute_url(),
 keep_items=dict(portal_status_message=N_('Upcoming Transaction Created')))
source=\'\', destination=\'\', at_date=None, from_date=0, amount=0, side=\'\', listbox_uid=None, uids=None, cancel_url=\'\', **kw
